description: Jaken is a small green imp-like youkai who is extremely loyal to Sesshomaru, often praising his master`s greatness although Sesshomaru usually ignores him. Jaken himself is not especially powerful, despite bearing a weapon known as the Staff of Two Heads. He seldom engages in battle and is actually killed by Kaijinbo with Toukijin, but Sesshomaru resurrects him with Tenseiga.
name: Jaken
